Package ohos.sensor.data

Class CategoryEnvironmentData

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.sensor.data.SensorData<CategoryEnvironment>
      • ohos.sensor.data.CategoryEnvironmentData

  • public class CategoryEnvironmentData
extends SensorData<CategoryEnvironment>
    Inherits from SensorData and describes data information of environment sensors.

    The data information includes the timestamps, accuracy, data values, and data dimensions of sensors. This class also provides the method for constructing a CategoryEnvironmentData instance.

    Since:
    1
    See Also:
    SensorData, CategoryEnvironment
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Sensors#SENSOR

      • CategoryEnvironmentData

                               int accuracy,
                               long timestamp,
                               int sensorDataDim,
                               float[] values)
        A constructor used to create a CategoryEnvironmentData instance.
        Parameters:
        sensor - Indicates a sensor.
        accuracy - Indicates the sensor accuracy.
        timestamp - Indicates the sensor timestamp.
        sensorDataDim - Indicates the data dimension of the sensor.
        values - Indicates the data values of the sensor.
        Since:
        1

    • Method Detail

      • getDeviceAltitude

        public static float getDeviceAltitude​(float seaPressure,
                                      float currentPressure)
        Obtains the altitude at which the device is located based on the sea-level atmospheric pressure and the current atmospheric pressure.
        Parameters:
        seaPressure - Indicates the sea-level atmospheric pressure, in hPa. The value can be SEA_PRESSURE.
        currentPressure - Indicates the atmospheric pressure measured by the barometer, in hPa.
        Returns:
        Returns the altitude in meters at which the device is located.
        Since:
        5

      • getDeviceAltitude

        Obtains the altitude at which the device is located based on the current atmospheric pressure.
        Parameters:
        currentPressure - Indicates the atmospheric pressure measured by the barometer, in hPa.
        Returns:
        Returns the altitude in meters at which the device is located.
        Since:
        5
